relation: From a bad guy they become good ones.
pageTitle: CRC Directory - CHILDREN’S JOY FOUNDATION INC. (CJFI)
textBeforeTable: ADVOCACY EXPERIENCES: Information Communication Resources: • Library • Internet connection • Website • Cable TV Human Resources: • Executive officers • Educators/Trainers • Field workers Physical Resources: • Buildings/Offices • Dormitories • Still and video cameras • Computers • Cell phones • Copier Area of Operation: Nationwide Indigent children and families in the community Community Services Children who are 6-18 years old Residential Care Primary Participants Program Service PROGRAMS AND SERVICES:
textAfterTable: Accomplishments : Year Description Education & Basic needs provided – residential center 2000-09 Giving children scholarship grants/feed/cloth, etc. Repair of day care center - for community program 2005 Day care center in remote areas needed repair Giving Feedings to malnourished children in depressed areas 2005-present Feeding continues for 1 to 3 mos.       Emerging Issues: • Child labor in industrial plantations/companies • Pornography is rampant; even school children were seen at internet cafés • Lack of Child Caring Agency to cater to these children's needs and provide funds for sustainability CAPACITIES AND NEEDS : Capacity for CRC work
